page.story_text: Zara and her mom loved to snuggle on the sofa reading and telling each other stories. Zara turned to her mom and asked if she could tell her about when she was born.
page.scene_description: Zara and her mom cuddle close on a soft, cushy sofa, a colorful picture book open on their laps as Zara looks up with curious, sparkling eyes and asks about the day she was born. The cozy living room is filled with gentle details like a patterned rug, a few scattered toys, a small bookshelf of storybooks, and a framed family photo, with a sleepy cat curled up on a nearby cushion. Warm, golden lamplight bathes the scene in a soft glow, with gentle lines and pastel colors creating a snug, heartwarming composition that draws the viewer into their quiet storytime moment.
